'''Minecraft x UNIQLO Skins Vol 2''' is a free [[skin pack]], the second after [[Minecraft x Uniqlo Skin Pack]], that consists of 15 skins promoting the collaboration between ''Minecraft'' and Japanese fashion brand ''{{Wikipedia|Uniqlo}}''<ref>{{Mcnet|minecraft-x-uniqlo-collaboration---volume-2|Minecraft x Uniqlo Collaboration – Volume 2|March 9, 2021|Cristina Anderca}}</ref>.
